dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
There are a few developers who took the  

game Bubble Shooter, a proprietary of Absolutist, and are distributing it 

with a new title on Google Play.
It was our company Absolutist that created a unique mechanics of the game 

and all the graphics assets from the ground. That's why we ask you to  
delete the pirate copies of the game from GooglePlay store.
